question: Dua / Prayer to get married.
answer:
QUESTION
I am 30 + and want to get married earliest, is there any dua specific dua to make this happen soon.
ANSWER


Share:
Recite durood (salutations) upon Rasulullah 500 times.

And Allah Ta'ala knows best.

Was salaam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Fatwa Department
